• Acht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe 2004
The Private Residential Tenancies Board (PRTB) was set up under the Residential Tenancies Act 2004
Bunaíodh an Bord um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe Príobháideacha (BTCP) faoin Acht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe 2004
The RTB's main functions are:
Is é an príomh-ról atá aige:
• Maintaining a register of private residential tenancies and tenancies of approved housing bodies
• Clár thionóntachtaí príobháideacha a chothabháil
• Providing a dispute resolution service for tenants and landlords (including approved housing bodies)
• Seirbhís réitigh díospóide a sholáthar
• Carrying out research into the private rented sector
• Dul i mbun taighde maidir le hearnáil an chíosa phríobháidigh
It also provides policy advice to the Government on the private rented sector
Ina theannta seo, tugann an Bord comhairle beartais don Rialtas maidir le h-earnáil an chíosa phríobháidigh
They set out the rights and obligations of both landlords and tenants in these sectors
Athraíonn an tAcht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) 2015 cuid de na rialacha
Services provided by the RTB
Beidh tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil go luath
Read more in our document on registering a tenancy
Acht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe 2004
The RTB can share information with local authorities, which enforce the regulations relating to standards and rent books
Pléann an tAcht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe 2004 le rialáil earnáil phríomhshrutha na tithíochta príobháidí ar cíos
You can initiate the dispute resolution process if you are a tenant, a landlord or are otherwise directly affected by a problem (for example, if you are a neighbour)
Sonraíonn an tAcht cearta agus oibleagáidí tionóntaí agus tiarnaí talún araon maidir le tionóntachtaí príobháideacha tithíochta
The RTB has published a number of research reports on issues in the private rented sector and it also publishes a quarterly Rent Index
Séard is tionóntacht phríobháideach tithíochta inti ná tionóntacht a n-aontaíodh go príobháideach idir tionónta agus tiarna talún
The Residential Tenancies Acts 2004-2015 do not apply to the following types of rented property:
Ní fheidhmíonn an tAcht do chineálacha áirithe maoine ar cíos:
• Formerly rent-controlled dwellings or long occupation lease tenancies – separate legislation applies to them
• Ionaid chónaithe a bhíodh faoi rialú cíosa nó tionóntachtaí ar léas fad-sealbhaithe – feidhmíonn reachtaíocht ar leithligh dóibhsean
• A room that you rent in your landlord's home
• Cóiríocht i seilbh an úinéara (m.sh
• Dwellings in which the spouse, parent or child of the landlord lives
• Ionaid chónaithe ina gcónaíonn céile, tuismitheoir nó leanbh leis an tiarna talún
This applies to informal family arrangements where there is no tenancy agreement in writing
Feidhmíonn seo do shocrúcháin theaghlaigh neamhfhoirmiúla nach mbíonn aon chomhaontú tionóntachta ann i scríbhinn
However, the Act does cover formal agreements between family members, for example where a lease has been signed
Cumhdaíonn an tAcht comhaontuithe foirmiúla idir baill teaghlaigh m.sh. mar ar síníodh léas
Part 4 of the Act (which deals with security of tenure) does not apply to:
Ní fheidhmíonn Cuid 4 den Acht (a chlúdaíonn daingneacht tionachta) do:
• Employment-related lettings – these are sometimes called 'tied' houses in that they are tied to the job and you must leave the dwelling when the job ends, and

• Ligean a bhaineann le fostaíocht – tugtar tithe 'ceangailte' orthu seo ar uairibh, sa mhéid is go mbíonn siad ceangailte leis an bpost agus nach mór duit an teach cónaithe a fhágáil ar chríochnú an phoist féin
• Section 50 student accommodation (pdf)
• Cóiríocht do mhic léinn faoi Alt 50 (pdf)

The basic rate is €90 per tenancy where the RTB receives the completed application within a month of the start of the tenancy, with a late fee of €180 per tenancy where an application is received after that
Déanann an Bord clár náisiúnta tionóntachtaí príobháideacha a chothabháil. Ní mór tionóntachtaí a chlárú
Reduced rates apply to approved housing bodies for 12 months from 7 April 2016
Tá tiarnaí talún freagrach as clárú agus gerrtar píonóis ar thiarnaí talún nach gcláraíonn
The online fee for dispute resolution by adjudication is €15 and it costs €25 to apply on paper
Is féidir le tiarnaí talún, tionóntaí agus páirtithe eile ar a dtéann an díospóid i bhfeidhm (m.sh
There is no fee if you apply to have your dispute resolved by mediation
comharsana) réiteach na díospóide a thionscnamh
The online fee for appeal to a tenancy tribunal is €85 and it costs €100 to apply on paper
Léigh tuilleadh inár ndoiciméad ar díospóidí a réiteach agus ar láithreán gréasáin an BTCP
You can register a tenancy online or else contact the RTB and ask for a tenancy registration form
Léigh tuilleadh ar láithreán gréasáin BTCP
You can submit a dispute online or else contact the RTB and ask for a dispute application form
Ní ghearrtar an BTCP táille iarratais nuair a roghnaíonn tú an díospóid a réiteach trí idirghabháil
